marklogic.body:
A whole new level of arrogance and ignorance is wrapped up in the "emergency" prairie ordinance championed by Thurston County Commissioners and the central planners who support them.Â Here a man-made and man-maintained habitat is going to be destroyed through the neglect encouraged and incentivized by this ordinance.Â Fewer oak trees will exist, fewer "prairies" will exist, and the horror of trees taking over the habitat will occur.Â It will all be "natural" so that is okay, I guess.Â
In the process, great harm is inflicted on those who managed to be good stewards of their lands - in some cases for many generations.Â The excuse of pocket gophers, oak trees, Spotted owls, etc - they are just nice window dressing for those who justify harming their neighbors for their own agendas.Â Unintended consequences Always follow these actions - and those who enjoy inflicting them on the rest of us - they never have to say they are sorry.Â After all - they meant well.
